channel.title: Need help using rs2dv 2nd release and 317Serv - NEW VERSION [2.5]
channel.description:
Well read the title, i need help with those two things.
I need help because im going to MAKE the best P Serve Ever, and hopefully with your help!!
These are the 'simple' tuts im looking for, then hopefully from there i will learn how to use ^^;
Adding Npc's Making Menu's Starting equipment Home Please Adding GLobal Objects.
You must remembe!! This is all different to the 317 severs like wL, there is no client.java
Best regards and hope you can help me Johno
EDIT And there will be a credits page on my server, will all your names who has helped me!
These are the three files i downloaded;
317Serv - NEW VERSION [2.5] - has a project file and the source
rs2dv - rs2 base, what is it used for?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 25, 2009, 11:11:22 am[/size][hr]Anyone please help?

item.title: Need help using rs2dv 2nd release and 317Serv - NEW VERSION [2.5]
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Well read the title, i need help with those two things.

I need help because im going to MAKE the best P Serve Ever, and hopefully with your help!!

These are the ‘simple’ tuts im looking for, then hopefully from there i will learn how to use ^^;

Adding Npc’s
Making Menu’s
Starting equipment
Home Please
Adding GLobal Objects.

You must remembe!! This is all different to the 317 severs like wL, there is no client.java

Best regards and hope you can help me
Johno

EDIT And there will be a credits page on my server, will all your names who has helped me!
